input_full.title: /task crush - batch issue resolution mode
input_full.body:
Automate the recurring pattern of:

1. Loading all open issues via `sbs_issue_list`
2. Spawning oracle agent(s) to gather context on each issue
3. Entering alignment with the goal of closing as many issues as possible in one session

Should be invocable as `/task crush` and wire up the pre-alignment context gathering automatically, so the orchestrator enters alignment already informed about the issue landscape.

**Current manual workflow being replaced:**
```
/task Please do the following:
1) Load all of the open issues using the custom mcp tool
2) Deploy an agent tasked with consulting an oracle as many times as it needs to report back to you so you can be properly informed for the following:
3) Start an alignment dialogue. The goal of this task is to close as many open issues as possible.
```

---
Created with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

- **Area**: `area:devtools:skills` - this is about skill definition/invocation
- **Impact**: `impact:friction-reduction` - reduces repetitive manual setup
- **Friction**: `friction:repeated-work` - they do this pattern often and want it automated
